title: Severe storms move through Tallahassee with possible tornadoes | Flipboard
text: Severe storms move through Tallahassee with possible tornadoes The National Weather Service issued several severe thunderstorm and tornado warnings for a potent line of storms. TALLAHASSEE, Fla. — Possible … Related storyboards More stories from [Tallahassee](/topic/tallahassee) [Florida Rep. Matt Gaetz Vows To Hold Federal Prisons Chief Accountable For Blocking Access To Former Trump Aide](/topic/tallahassee/florida-rep-matt-gaetz-vows-to-hold-federal-prisons-chief-accountable-for-block/a-Sqe-oyzySL6Df-LNWPlZ2A%3Aa%3A3821609766-cfd03930ab%2Ftampafp.com) Led by Rep. Matt Gaetz, some House Republicans plan to haul the head of the federal prison system into a hearing to explain why she’s blocking access … [Reported tornado hits downtown Tallahassee – more than 60,000 without power](/topic/tallahassee/reported-tornado-hits-downtown-tallahassee-more-than-60-000-without-power/a-he_cktcGRtC6i-irx7bVuw%3Aa%3A3974374320-d5c41514cb%2Ffloridaphoenix.com) There are reports Friday morning of possible tornado activity in Tallahassee, with over 66,000 customers without electricity as of 9:00 am today, … [Possible Tallahassee tornado aftermath](/topic/tallahassee/possible-tallahassee-tornado-aftermath/a-4JbT4z7rRoCUpOM-zavb5A%3Aa%3A3483441346-76e712fed0%2Fflipboard.com) Joey Silvestri shows the aftermath of the storm and possible tornado that slammed the Florida panhandle on Friday morning.
